## ğŸš€ **USAGE & MONITORING**

### **End-of-Session Usage Protocol**

**When Phase 2 Completes**: All agents should begin using Output Flywheel at end-of-session.

**Process**:
1. Agent completes work session
2. Agent runs `tools/run_output_flywheel.py` to generate artifacts
3. Artifacts automatically queued for publication (Phase 3)
4. Agent-5 monitoring tracks usage metrics

**Coordination**: Agent-6 will broadcast usage instructions when Phase 2 is complete.
